name: JBL T500BT On Ear Bluetooth Wireless Headphones
description: The new era of listening - deep, powerful JBL Pure Bass brings you the highest quality, and most precise sound for a crystal clear level of audio meant to be felt, not just heard.

name: Sony SRS-XB12 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact yet powerful, the SRS-XB12 portable wireless speaker features EXTRA BASS for deep, punchy sound and a battery life of up to 16 hours. It's also waterproof and dustproof for your peace of mind.

name: Apple iPhone 11 Pro 256GB
description: With a 5.8-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, Water and dust resistance, Triple-camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras, Face ID and Apple Pay.

name: Apple Watch Series 5
description: Now with features like the Always-On Retina display, calling, texting and Apple Pay. With advanced workout metrics, GPS, and water resistance to 50 meters, it’s made for all the ways you exercise.

name: ZMI Power Bank 20000mAh
description: The latest Powerbank Xiaomi ZMI Aura QB822 has two USB ports, a bi-directional USB-C port and a microUSB input and an LED indicatorto monitor the charge status of the power bank.

name: Apple iPad Pro 12.9"
description: The 8‑core graphics processor delivers fluid performance, features pro cameras that can transform reality. Can be used with touch, pencil, keyboard and now trackpad.

name: Amazon Echo Dot 3rd Gen
description: With a new speaker and design, Echo Dot is a voice-controlled smart speaker with Alexa, designed for any room. Ask for music, news, information, control compatible smart home devices and more.

name: Apple Airpods Pro
description: AirPods Pro have been designed to deliver Active Noise Cancellation for immersive sound, Transparency mode, and a customizable fit for all-day comfort.

name: SanDisk Cruzer 64GB USB 3.0
description: SanDisk Cruzer Ultra Flair 64GB USB 30 SDCZ73064GG46 Storage USB Memory Sticks

name: Samsung T5 2TB USB 3.1 External SSD
description: Performance of up to 540 MB/s, up to 4.9x faster than external HDD,USB 3.1 Gen 2 (Up to 10Gbps). Backwards compatible.
